name: Super Beta Tester
summary:
You work as a Beta Tester at Mega Industries platform development division. Your sole purpose in life is to find the optimal way through the company's platformer games. This valuable information will be used to make their games even harder - because the harder the game is, the more the customers will have to pay to get to the next level.

In this puzzle game you control the hero via action blocks in platform levels. The game includes tutorial levels and nine level packs. (A total of 80+ levels are included) The game also includes an editor for making your own levels.
